summary: Two young people plan to steal a baseball card collection from an elderly man to fund their dream of setting up a recording studio. However, their plans go awry when one of them ends up falling in love with the man's nurse.
cast: Charlie Hewson|Eric Edelstein|Simone Moore|Peter Abbruscato|Alyxandria J. Batty|Stephanie Bella|Michael Cramer|Joseph Davis|Eugene W. Dundon III|Brian Patrick Farrell|Anthony Fazio|Steven Garcia|Maggie Marion|Patrick T. McGowan|Jenny Mercein|Matthew Perez|Jorge Pupo|Natasha Rinis|Josh Sankey|Heather Simms|Benjamin Slater|Matthew Slater|Giuseppe Solinas|Angela Valentine|Summer Valentine|Lee Walker|AlexAnn Hopkins
title: The Prospects
